CustomField.description: Airport the Voucher is associated with
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT($User.LanguageLocaleKey) = 'pt_PT', CASE(COMM_Product__r.COMM_Airport__c, "OPO", "Porto", "LIS","Lisboa", "FAO","Faro", "FNC","Madeira", "PDL","Ponta Delgada", TEXT(COMM_Product__r.COMM_Airport__c)), IF(TEXT($User.LanguageLocaleKey) = 'es', CASE(COMM_Product__r.COMM_Airport__c, "OPO", "OPorto", "LIS","Lisboa", "FAO","Faro", "FNC","Madeira", "PDL","Ponta Delgada", TEXT(COMM_Product__r.COMM_Airport__c)), CASE(COMM_Product__r.COMM_Airport__c, "OPO", "Porto", "LIS","Lisbon", "FAO","Faro", "FNC","Madeira", "PDL","Ponta Delgada", TEXT(COMM_Product__r.COMM_Airport__c))))
CustomField.label: Airport
